intro: Your courage is commendable, but your manners could use some work.
Wha.. What was that?
y_c! Just the cat I wanted to see.
What? I've been looking for you for a very serious reason! And that reason is... I want to hang out!
Listen, I don't get much time off, okay? You should be happy I wanna spend it with you.
Hey, I was looking for you all around the camp!
I need you to clean out the dirt-place, yeah? It's gotten quite stinky 'round there.
Uh-uh! No buts. We can't just have dung lying around the camp like that, and I think that you are the one for the job!
Just do it, it's not that serious! You won't die from cleaning some... Hey! Where are you going? I'm not done talking to you!
Do you know how to defend yourself?
If something were to try to harm these kits, how would you protect them?
Hm ... I suppose that's a ... decent strategy. But your form is sloppy, and your technique needs work.
Come and find me sometime, and I'll show you.
[After a lot of pestering from the kits, you agree to show off some of the skills m_n taught you, and host a little training session.]
[t_c pads by the nursery, pausing to watch your demonstration.]
You call that a hunter's crouch? Tch...
Your stance is all wrong- your tail is too high and your paws are too close together.
And not to mention that mangy pelt... m_n has got some work to do, that's for sure.
[t_c flicks {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} tail as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/leave/leaves} the nursery, leaving you dumbfounded as r_k looks at you confusedly.]
Hm? A kit? What are you doing?
Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
The leader's den is no place for one so young ...
y_c. We have something to discuss.
You've been avoiding patrols lately. Don't even try to deny it.
I know you don't like to take things seriously, but this is reality. We are warriors. Face it. Or don't.
But just know that your lack of initiative could cost your Clanmates shelter, food, warmth and safety. Are you willing to risk it?
[t_c glowers at you, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} expression unnervingly cold. StarClan, you forgot how scary {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} can be when {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/need/needs} to ...]
y_c! Border patrol. I've already told the rest of the patrol to gather next to the entrance.
[You try to explain that you were planning to do something, but r_w is free to patrol.]
You had plans? Too bad. You're being sent on this patrol whether you like it or not.
[As you walk over to your patrol's group, you hear t_c call out.]
Make sure you don't make a fool of yourself along the o_cClan border! We wouldn't want them thinking we're weak.
I went on a hunting patrol with neutral_r_w the other day and found THE cutest mouse I think I've ever seen. It had big, innocent eyes and it was snacking on a blackberry!
It was large, so neutral_r_w wanted to catch it for c_nClan, but I couldn't bear to see it killed.
I, ah, ended up scaring it off to save it from being caught. That... really didn't make neutral_r_w happy at all. But it was worth it! You should've seen the little thing!
Sigh... hi, y_c.
Hm? Yeah, I just got back from a hunting patrol... I utterly embarrassed myself. I had a mouse literally walk into my paws and I still failed to grab it.
... Hm. Yes, that's true. I'm not going to always succeed, the best thing I can do is get back up and get back to it.
You're right, y_c. You're always right. Thank you.
Get up, y_c! We gotta go on a special patrol to check the o_cClan border!
Of course I'm serious, mouse-brain! Are you really gonna make me break it down for you?
The leader gave me this assignment, and told me to pick the cat in the Clan I trust the most to accompany me on it. Lo and behold, that's you!
Now, c'mon, lazybones! We've got a long walk ahead of us!
There's too much to do right now. Let's talk later.
Sorry, I'm a little busy! Mind if we talk later?
Argh! y_c, why do you always come at the worst possible time?
I'm busy now but let's talk later.
... Some cats have things to do.
Say that again and you'll regret it.
Stay far from me, murderer.
I can't look at you the same way anymore.
How do you live with yourself after what you've done?
Every time I see your face, I'm reminded of the life you took.
You may think you got away with it, but I'll never forget.
I hope one day your conscience catches up with you.
The guilt must eat at you every single day.
You may have fooled everyone else, but not me.
I can't trust someone capable of such an act.
You're a walking reminder of the darkness that exists.
Your secret is safe with me, but don't expect my forgiveness.
Something I've noticed about you, y_c, is that you think too much.
That's not exactly a bad thing, plenty of apprentices are hesitant, but in the heat of battle, there's no time for thinking. You just have to see the target in front of you, and go for it!
Then again, I can't even remember how many times I've been chewed out by the leader for acting too rashly ...
I guess it's all about balance. You can't doubt yourself too much, but you can't be blinded by confidence, either.
It's a tough thing to master, but I know you can do it!
Hey, y_c! Ready to start the day? I was thinking we could ditch the training grounds today and, instead, practice more real-world applied stuff.
Ah, don't look so worried. We don't have to do everything totally by the rules all the time! Sometimes, it's better to go off the beaten path.
I'll meet you by the camp entrance, m'kay?
What's going on, y_c? ... Hey, don't give me that nasty look! I can see you, you know!
For an apprentice, you sure have a lot of attitude. I get you've got spirit, but if this is gonna work out, the two of us have to work together.
So drop it. And I'd better not catch you looking at me like that again!
Alright, y_c! You're totally mastering that skill I taught you the other day ... you're improving so fast, pretty soon, you're gonna be outperforming me! Haha!
I have nothing to say, except for, I guess ... I'm proud of you.
You're turning into a fine member of c_nClan already.
What did I do in a past life to wind up related to you, y_c?
Must've been really terrible.
What do you want? Do you need something?
... You just want to talk? Why?
... Because we're family?
Do we still even count as family anymore?
Ugh, StarClan, would you leave me alone?
Seriously, I don't know any other parent who bothers their grown kit this much!
Sorry, y_c! No time to talk right now, I just got a task from l_n.
I'll be sure to catch up with you some other time, though!
[It's hard to believe your own kit is in charge of you now ...]
[The sight of {PRONOUN/t_c/object} standing alongside l_n fills your heart with pride!]
Hey, mouse-brain! Watch where you're going!
Wait, I recognize you. You're one of the new kits, right? Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
Hmph. Whatever. Just stay outta the real warriors' way, before someone squishes you.
Hey there, y_c! Not bad weather today, hm?
Sun on my pelt, wind in my fur ... Could you imagine being a kittypet and having to be cooped up in a Twoleg nest all day? I think I would go crazy!
Just another reason why it's great to be a Clan cat.
[t_c's been undermining you in meetings lately, and making rash decisions without consulting you. You decide to confront {PRONOUN/t_c/object} about it.]
Oh, hey, y_c. What's up?
[You share your concerns.]
... Oh. I see.
I'm sorry. I didn't realize ...
... Didn't realize I'm just supposed to be your obedient apprentice all the time!
I'm a full grown cat, y_c. I'm allowed to express my opinions when and where I want to. I didn't realize becoming become your deputy meant giving that up.

You want me to stop? How about actually listening to me, for once, and maybe implementing some of my ideas. Maybe then, I'll listen. But you just ordering me around, as always, isn't exactly compelling.
Yeah, I sent out a border patrol today. What about it?
You ... already sent one out earlier?
Well, why in StarClan's name would you not tell me that?!
Now I gotta ... Just ... Ugh!
[t_c stalks away muttering curses. You can't tell if you resent {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} disrespectful attitude, or respect it.]
All good news today! Camp is looking stable, all the moss in the warriors' den was just replaced, and we patched up that hole in the wall with mud.
Life seems to be looking up, ah?
Happy to report, all seems peaceful!
Thought I should let you know, my patrol ran into a bit of trouble today. A rowdy gang of kittypets near Twolegplace.
We made quick work of 'em, though! And didn't even have to unsheath a claw ... One cold glare and they went scampering right back to their Twolegs! Haha!
I gotta admit, it made me feel pretty powerful ... Guess c_nClan's reputation is starting to precede us!
[You spot t_c racing a few of the warriors around camp, their laughter reverberating off the walls.]
[Despite being the deputy, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} presence seems to somehow put everyone at ease.]
Hey, furbag. I brought you something!
[t_c lays a colorful feather at your paws.]
I know this is your favorite color, and you miss exploring the territory. So I knew I just had to bring it to you.
Yeah, yeah, don't get all soft on me, hehe. Wanna grab a meal together?
y_c, I think I'm ready for an apprentice.
I'm qualified, I'm a good teacher, and I'd love a younger cat who I could show the ropes to!
I know it's not for me to say, but I just figured I'd put a good word in.
Do keep in mind, will ya?
Heya, y_c! How are the little ones today?
If you ever need any help at all, just give me a shout. I know they can be a pawful! Heh.
Hey, y_c! How are the kits today?
Ahhhh! StarClan, they're so cute! Can I help groom them?

Or - how about this? Maybe, every once in a while, I can hold a little kit-training session! Help them get a head start on their apprenticeships! It'll be like having a den of little warriors, hehehe!
Though, I guess I can see how that wouldn't be the best for you ...
Oh, what the heck. Let the kits be kits for now! They'll start their training when they're ready.
Seeya, y_c! I'll definitely have to come and visit more often.
Hehe. Of course you'd never leave the nursery, y_c.
You don't have what it takes to be a real warrior. Not in a million moons!
But, uh, this is ... okay too, I guess! If you think becoming a full-time kitsitter is comparable to, y'know ... finding food and protecting the Clan from danger.
Have fun hanging out with the queens, y_c. *Snrk*
Hmph. You may fight for peace, y_c, but I know it by another word - cowardice.

I know compromise has its place, but you'd say you'd really forsake your values - the values of this Clan - just so all of us can just laze around on our haunches and never have to risk anything real?
I don't think so. I fight for what I believe in. No matter what it costs.
Maybe think about that the next time you try to make a compromise with the enemy.
Man, you're insightful for an apprentice, y_c!
When I was your age, all I thought about was smashing stuff and chasing after my crushes. But now, here you are! Sorting out problems with cats who've been around ten times longer than you!
That must take a lot of discipline. The whole Clan is proud of you!
Oh, absolutely not. No way a little apprentice is going to tell me what's right and what's wrong.
Could you at least get your mentor over here, or something? Needing a so-called 'mediator' is already humiliating enough as it is.
Let alone when they're barely out of the nursery.
y_c, I think that peace is a noble pursuit, and all, but don't you think that there's some cases where conflict is necessary?
What about standing up for what's right? What about fighting for justice and fairness? You're still just an apprentice. You have a lot to learn about Clan life.
And, from what I've learned, sometimes the true only way to settle a dispute is with teeth and claws.
No matter what your mentor might tell you.
*Huff**Huff* Hey, y_c! What's happening? I was just doing some sparring.
I heard that you aren't allowed to fight for the Clan, 'cause it'd make you biased in your mediation - man, that must take some restraint.
If it were me, I'd want to claw the ears off of half the mouse-brains in this Clan! Haha!
Y'know, sometimes I worry about you, y_c. If anything ever tries to hurt you, then how will you defend yourself?
Though, I guess if I were caught out in the cold, I wouldn't be able to patch myself up, either ...
Tell you what. How about, when you have a little down time, I can teach you some basic battle moves? And, likewise, you can teach me some stuff about healing!
That way, we can both make each other stronger.
See you soon!
Hey, y_c! I got into a bit of trouble again. No big deal, just a scratch!
[It is not, in fact, just a scratch. In fact, t_c is bleeding all over the medicine den. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/chat/chats} loudly as you hurry to help {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]
Man, I must be using up, like, half your herb stores, huh? But where's the fun in being careful? Besides, I know you could use some company in here.
Oh man, what type of herbs are those? They look cool. Are you talking to StarClan? Can you hear them right now?
[You finish helping t_c with {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} injury.]
Hey, thanks! I owe you a bunch! What? You want me to stay and rest? Sorry, y_c. That's not really my style. I gotta get back out there!
But, ah, maybe I'll try to go a little easier. Just for you. *Wink*
Doesn't it drive you insane, being cooped up inside camp all day?
What about the thrill of adventure? The wind in your fur? The satisfaction of killing a hard-earned piece of prey?
Respect to you, y_c. I could never do what you do. Though, I suppose the Clan needs all types of cats to function.
y_c, if you ever need a warrior escort while gathering herbs, you'll come to me, right?
I'll keep you safe from any danger that comes your way! Yah! Hiyah!
[t_c mimes battle moves against imaginary enemies.]
How's it going, mini-medicine cat? Herbal life treating you well?
Don't worry, I'm not going to run headfirst into trouble and injure myself today.
As for tomorrow? Who knows!
Not always easy in the apprentice's den, huh? I remember those days. Sometimes cats can be so cliquey, especially the young ones ...
But, no matter what, you can never let fear hold you back from being who you are! Work hard, be friendly, and forget anyone who tries to get you down!
That's real bravery. Not just rushing into battle, but also standing up for what you believe in. And bravery is what makes a warrior who they are.
Heh, look at me, getting all wise ... Just my opinion, is all.
Heads up, y_c! Moss in the elders' den needs changing!
Guess being a warrior's not always fighting battles and scaring off kittypets, huh?
But there's still plenty of that, too, if you're lucky. Hehehe.
Hey, y_c! I brought you back something from my last patrol. Take a look!
[t_c drops a colorful feather at your paws.]
You wanna know how I found it? Oh, it's a crazy story. I was on a hunting patrol, when I found this huge bird, and ...
[t_c regales you with a daring story full of thrills, twists, and turns.]
... And then I got the feather! Quite the adventure, no?
Just wait until you're old enough. You'll be having plenty of adventures of your own before you know it!
Working hard, y_c? Or, is it more like hardly working? Hehe.
Y'know, it's good to contribute to the Clan, but make sure you take some time to grow up, too. Working isn't everything. Now's the time for you to get out and explore!
*Sigh* I sorta miss those days myself ...
Hey, furbag. I brought you something!
[t_c lays a colorful feather at your paws.]
I know this is your favorite color, and you miss exploring the territory. So I knew I just had to bring it to you.
Yeah, yeah, don't get all soft on me, hehe. Wanna grab a meal together?
*Sigh* Y'know, y_c, sometimes I wonder if I'm really cut out for this ...
I'm supposed to be out on the battlefield fighting alongside my Clanmates! Not ... organizing patrols and negotiating territory!
On the worst nights, I wonder why l_n even chose me to succeed {PRONOUN/l_n/object} ... This responsibility was never something I signed up for!
If I could do it all over again, would I even have accepted the position at all?
Everyone in the whole Clan is counting on me ... Do they know I have no idea what I'm doing?
Never in a million moons did I ever dream I'd be deputy...
I know I'm strong, but this position takes a whole new type of strength. I'm just not sure if I can ...

[You assure t_c that l_n chose {PRONOUN/t_c/object} for a reason and there's no better cat in the Clan for the job. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/seem/seems} to relax a little, but {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} gaze is still tinged with uncertainty ...]
Hey there, little guy!
Hehe, no need to look so scared. I don't bite!
... Aren't I important?
Well, sure, I'm important, but never too important to spend time with my Clan's great future warriors!
Now, tell me, how are you liking life in c_nClan? You growing up okay? Everybody treating you well?

If anything's ever bothering you, or there's something on your mind, never hesitate to speak up. This Clan is full of cats who want to help you grow up to be the best version of yourself you can be, myself included. Okay?
Now, go play! And make sure you save a game for me later! Hehe!
y_c, look at you! You are just growing up way too fast for your own good. Pretty soon, you'll be outpacing even me!
I better look out, or else c_nClan may have a new deputy soon! Hehehe!
Hey, y_c! Sure, I'll play a game! Who do you want to play as?
... Deputy?
[One of the queens quickly intervenes, apologizing to t_c for your transgression, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} quickly {VERB/t_c/brush/brushes} it off.]
Ah, don't worry about it. I'm happy to give up my position to y_c for a time. {PRONOUN/y_c/subject/CAP}'ll probably do a better job at it than I do, heh!
So, fearless deputy, what are we going to do today?
[You spend a few minutes delightfully ordering t_c around until l_n comes and steals {PRONOUN/t_c/object} away.]
y_c, today I'm assigning you to a solo patrol to the Thunderpath.
... Yes, I know it's dangerous. That's the whole point. We are warriors, in case you've forgotten, not cowardly kittypets.
Now, hurry up, and get out there already!
y_c, what's the problem? I'm very busy!
... You just want to 'chat' with me?
Hmph. If I were you, I'd smarten up and know better than to come to me with stuff like that. Especially when I'm trying to do my job.
Got it?
Ahh ... plentiful prey, good health, greenleaf is when c_nClan is at its best!
It's also, coincidentally, when my job's easiest! Hehe!
What's going on, y_c? I feel like you've been avoiding me lately.
You're ... worried I'm too busy for you?
Psh. Crazy talk!
Even though I'm deputy, I'll always make time for you. You're important to me! The rest of the Clan can wait.
You don't know if StarClan would approve of that?
Ah, who cares what those old, dead cats think? This is the land of the living!
And if I'm not allowed to spend time with you, then may they strike me down where I stand.
Hey, young y_c. Training hard?
We're all proud of you, kiddo. Don't think all your progress has gone unnoticed! I've been hearing great things!
It may be too soon to say, but there may be a new suffix coming your way ... If you have any requests, just let me know! I'll pass them on to l_n. *Wink*
Some cats criticize me for being too reckless in my decision making ... fox-dung, I say!
Of course I value the lives of all my Clanmates, but if there's one thing I value more, it's the principles and virtues that make this Clan what it is.

Strength, courage, honor, skill ... These are all things that are too precious to forsake. And if something comes by to threaten those things, you bet I'm gonna fight back with everything I've got to protect them!
That's what being a warrior is all about. Not cowering like a kittypet and letting others take what's rightfully ours, just to save a few drops of blood from being spilled.
Hey, flea-brain! I've been eyeing this huge thrush on the freshkill pile all day - wanna share it?
What the - the thrush is totally missing! But I was saving it for us!
That's it! I will not rest until the cat who did this is hunted down ... AND BROUGHT TO JUSTICE!!!
[You and t_c dissolve into a fit of giggles.]
Yaknow, y_c, I never really found you all that convincing as a warrior.
Real warriors are strong! We're fearless! We never back down from a fight!
But in you, I sense ... uncertainty.
Maybe you should see the medicine cat about it.
Hey y_c. Why don't you jump off a cliff? It's a new thing every cat in the Clan is trying.
[t_c is staring at you resentfully.]
Morning y_c. It's nice to see you up and early. Have you got anything planned?
I'm currently planning patrols. Based on the sky, I think the weather's going to be good. It's not going to rain for at least a couple of hours, and the breeze is pleasant.
Would you be willing to go on the sunhigh patrol? I believe you'll experience the best of the weather then.
Think of it as a... reward. For getting up and facing the day early. StarClan knows that it's sometimes the most difficult thing to do.
... y_c? Is something the matter? I heard from r_c that you were looking for me.
... Ah okay. Yes. You can go onto the moonhigh patrol if you want to, that's not a problem. I was thinking of going on it myself.
I always feel there's something... spiritual about it. I think it's because of the night time, watching Silverpelt at full strength.
It makes me feel even closer to our ancestors... And means I minimise the amount of cats I need to talk to.
Which is a bonus, I'll admit.
[t_c is staring off into space, eyes placed on the leader's den.]
... Hi, y_c. Is there something you need from me?
Yes. I'm fine. I'm just thinking...
Part of being a deputy means preparing to potentially become leader. I don't know whether that will ever happen, and I'm not wishing for anything to happen!
I just... I don't think I'm ready for that kind of responsibility. I'm not sure that I'll ever be ready for that.
... but at the same time. I'd do it, if it needs to be done. It's my duty after all.
[t_c is sitting next to a river outside camp, flicking {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} paws in the water.]
y_c. What brings you here? Are you wanting to fish?
... Yeah. I like the river, I don't get to come down here much anymore, since I became deputy, but I like having the opportunity to have some quiet.
Rivers are steadfast, you know. They only bend by their own volition, no cat can stop them on their own.
I wish to be more like that. Like less... malleable. More willing to stand up to what I believe in.
There'll be lots of trials and tribulations in the future, and I may need to fight for my future. I won't know until it comes, but still...
y_c. Good morning, is something the matter?
... Hm. That sounds difficult. I cannot speak on your behalf, obviously, you have your own choices to make in life. I cannot fight your battles for you.
But I do feel everything happens for a reason, you know. StarClan wills it all, the swell of the wind and the run of the river.
So I believe that everything will turn out okay. Everything has a reason, even if that reason is fate.
I suppose that's how I became the deputy of this Clan.
I'd just take a deep breath and try to take your mind off of it, at least for now. There's plenty to do around camp, I believe the apprentices' den's walls have broken again.
[You notice t_c calmly wandering away from the leader's den.]
Hm, y_c? Is something the matter?
No, it's fine. Was just having a discussion with l_n about an issue we're having with o_cClan. It's nothing massively important.
Just had a suggestion as to our next move when it comes to them. It's my duty to advise {PRONOUN/l_n/object} just as much as organising patrols.
Anyways, talking about patrols, I've got to sort out the next set. I'll speak to you later.
[t_c examines the camp with a stoic glare from the leader's den.]
Uhm. Hello. What are you doing here?
The leader's den is no place for a kit ...
What do you need? I'm very busy today.
You want to be placed on the border patrol ...?
Hm ... I'll see what I can do.
Sorry, is someone talking to me right now?
Can't you see I'm busy, mousebrain? Go bother someone else!
Go away!!!
Hey, y_c. You're looking smaller than usual. Maybe it's time to catch up on your training.
*Snrk.*
Hey, y_c! I just got a new scar today! Wanna come take a look?
Yeah, I ran into a little dog out at the edge of a territory. Wasn't too hard to chase off, but it gave me a little nick. Medicine cat says it's probably never going away.
[You brush your tail over t_c's scar, and {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/seem/seems} a little too thrilled by the gesture for it to just be friendly.]
StarClan, y_c, it's ... it's like you don't even know how beautiful you are.
... Augh. Look what you've done! Now I'm getting all sappy!
Just don't let it get to your head, furbag. I'm hot stuff, too.
[t_c winks at you, and you laugh together.]
Hey, y_c! I just finished visiting the kits in the nursery. StarClan, they're cute!
I wouldn't mind being a parent ... having a few mini-me's running around, terrorizing the Clan.
How about you? Do you ever see yourself having kits someday? Not in, like, a weird way, of course! Just curious, hehe.
[t_c swishes {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} tail nervously.]
Hey, y_c, what are your thoughts on feathers as a nesting material?
Why? Psh, don't play coy! We're basically sharing a nest at this point, with how often you sneak into mine. Haha!
Tell you what ... how about we ditch the formalities altogether and just make one, giant, super-nest!
Better start gathering moss! I know it's your favorite.
What's that? One of the kits told you your ears are too big?
What a load of fox-dung! Those kits don't have functioning brains. Besides, I like your ears! I think it's cute, how big they are!
Er ... not cute in that way, mind you. Just, y'know ... ahem ...
[The blush on t_c's cheeks confirms that, yes, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} did mean it in that way. And {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} doing a terrible job of hiding it.]
Hmph. What makes you so great?
Fight me one-on-one, and then we'll see who comes out on top!
Huh? Oh, nothing's wrong ...
Just ... had a bad day, is all ...
*Sigh* y_c, have you ever felt like you're not enough for anyone?
Usually, when it comes to making a decision, I never hesitate. Whatever the obstacle, I'll run headfirst into it, no questions asked.

But, today, on patrol, I didn't listen to the leader, and accidentally ran straight into an enemy trap. Luckily, r_w was there to keep everyone safe, but because of me, my Clanmates could've been hurt, or worse.
I just feel like such a failure. A liability. I can't help the way I am, but what if everyone's better off without me?
[You offer t_c words of reassurance, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/seem/seems} troubled beyond comforting.]
[Still, you sit with {PRONOUN/t_c/object} through the night, hoping to stabilize {PRONOUN/t_c/object} through whatever storm {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} might be weathering right now.]
*Sigh* Can't you see I have more important things to do, y_c?
Go back to catching mice, or whatever.
y_c, are you worried at all about the size of the Clan?
I just hope we can keep everyone fed through leafbare ...
The new apprentices are doing well, aren't they?
r_a, especially, has been a great teacher ... We should keep it in mind for future reference.
Need something, y_c? Or just coming by to chat?
Wow, I'm totally in demand! r_c just came by earlier too.
Everyone wants to say hi to the ol' deputy. Appreciate it.
Well, y_c, sometimes you just gotta let out a big roar straight from your gut!
That's what I do whenever I mess up patrols, heh.
Okay, let's roar together!
Ready... MROOOOOOOOOOW!!!
Recently I've been thinking about the best way to talk to neutral_r_c.
We'll say hi to each other now and then, but I can never say anything to get the conversation going.

Or, maybe I'll just let them have a free day today... Yeah, good enough. I'm going back to my nest, then. Nighty!~

Oh, sometimes I hate being busy all the time! One minute I have to organize patrols, and the next I have to deal with important c_nClan business, and then go on my own patrols for the day, and who knows what else?
Seriously! I can barely manage my own day, how does l_n expect me to manage the days of everyone else? If only I had some way to visualize it all...
